gui.charmofundying.config.renderTotem.de: If enabled, renders the equipped totem on players.
gui.charmofundying.config.xOffset.descri: The horizontal offset for rendering the totem on the player.
gui.charmofundying.config.xOffset.name: Horizontal rendering offset
gui.charmofundying.config.yOffset.descri: The vertical offset for rendering the totem on the player.
gui.charmofundying.config.yOffset.name: Vertical rendering offset
gui.charmofundying.config.zOffset.descri: The z-axis offset for rendering the totem on the player.
gui.charmofundying.config.zOffset.name: Z-Axis rendering offset
